name: Maryan
summary_text: A contract worker in Sudan is abducted by mercenaries and his lover in India awaits his return.

name: The Boy Friend
summary_text: When the leading lady of a low-budget musical revue sprains her ankle, the assistant stage manager is forced to understudy and perform in her place, becoming a star and finding love in the process.

name: Munna Michael
summary_text: A young man, tries to follow the footsteps of his idol, The King of Pop, Michael Jackson.

name: Asphalte
summary_text: Improbable encounters bring tenderness, laughter and compassion to a world of urban alienation.

name: Sümela'nin Sifresi: Temel
summary_text: Sümela'nin Sifresi: Temel is 2011 comedy movie.Temel is local and personalized character of Black Sea.

name: Osenniy marafon
summary_text: School teacher is cheating on his wife and lies about it.

name: Jayne Mansfield's Car
summary_text: Alabama; 1969: The death of a clan's estranged wife and mother brings together two very different families. Do the scars of the past hide differences that will tear them apart, or expose truths that could lead to unexpected collisions?

name: The Return of Frank James
summary_text: Frank James continues to avoid arrest in order to take revenge on the Ford brothers for their murder of his brother Jesse.

name: Edvard Munch
summary_text: A dramatic, rich and insightful look at the life of artist, Edvard Munch

name: Reap the Wild Wind
summary_text: Florida ship salvager, Loxi, falls for Jack, captain of a ship wrecked on the Key West shore. However, their romance is complicated by the arrival of another suitor, and eventually leads to tragedy.

name: The Maus
summary_text: Alex and Selma are a couple in love on a trip to the heart of Bosnia and Herzegovina to discover more about each other. Lost and seemingly surrounded by land mines a pair of locals offer to guide them home.

name: Kanche
summary_text: A rivalry between two men, based on caste and social status, extends from an Indian village to war torn Europe during WW2.

name: We Are Family
summary_text: A divorced mother of three children runs a happy household - until her former husband brings his new career-oriented girlfriend into the picture.

name: Solomon and Sheba
summary_text: After becoming king of ancient Israel, Solomon faces threats coming from his jealous dispossessed brother Adonijah, the Egyptian Pharaoh and the scheming Queen of Sheba.

name: The Catered Affair
summary_text: When Jane tells her parents that she is getting married to Ralph Halloran, her mother Agnes, starts planning an elaborate wedding, even though Jane does not wish it.

name: Long Way North
summary_text: In 1882, a young Russian aristocrat goes on an epic adventure to find out what happened to her grandfather and save her family's reputation.

name: Higher Ground
summary_text: A chronicle of one woman's lifelong struggle with her faith.

name: Once Upon a Holiday
summary_text: When a Princess escapes her entourage to explore New York City over Christmas, she meets a young man who shows the beautiful stranger his side of the city.

name: Look Both Ways
summary_text: During one unusually hot and tragic weekend, four people struggle after hearing some life-changing news, this in turn brings them together.

name: Ash Wednesday
summary_text: Ash Wednesday is set in the Manhattan of the early 1980's and is about a pair of Irish-American brothers (Burns and Wood) who become embroiled in a conflict with the Irish Mob.

name: I Love You, Alice B. Toklas!
summary_text: A thirty-something square falls in love with a hippie and decides to "drop out" himself.

name: Mad Monster Party?
summary_text: On the Isle of Evil, the head of the "World Organization of Monsters" reveals his imminent retirement and that he has refined a formula for total destruction, only to be upset when the monsters try to steal the formula and kill his nephew.

name: F.A.L.T.U
summary_text: Unable to get accepted, four academically-challenged students decide to open their own college.

name: Superstar
summary_text: An arrogant movie star's life drastically changes when a teenage girl shows up.

name: Dead Mine
summary_text: The legend of Yamashita's Gold lures a treasure hunter and his group deep into the Indonesian jungle. Once they are trapped in an abandoned World War II Japanese bunker, they face the terrifying reality that the only way out is to go further in.

name: Hannie Caulder
summary_text: After she is raped and her husband murdered, a woman hires a bounty hunter to instruct her in the use of a gun so she can get her revenge on the three outlaws responsible.

name: Jak rozpetalem druga wojne swiatowa
summary_text: The adventures of unlucky Polish soldier Franek Dolas during world war II. In September he escapes from Stalag and goes to France. After that he fights in Africa and Europe.

name: Joan of Arc
summary_text: The abbreviated life of the 15th Century French heroine.

name: Jubilee
summary_text: Queen Elisabeth I travels 400 years into the future to witness the appalling revelation of a dystopian London overrun by corruption and a vicious gang of punk guerrilla girls led by the new Monarch of Punk.

name: The Axiom
summary_text: At the risk of her group's safety, a young woman travels into a National Forest where her sister has become trapped in a multi-dimensional world of monsters.

summary_text: A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.

summary_text: Contemporary Russia. Nadya gives up her dream of becoming a champion figure skater when she is hospitalized with an injury. But then she meets Sasha, a hockey player, who decides to teach her to believe in herself and her dream again.

name: Chal Mere Bhai
summary_text: Vicky, a businessman, loves his younger brother Prem, who spends his time chasing women. The family feels that secretary Sapna will make a good wife for Vicky, but she is already in love with Prem.

name: Totally F***ed Up
summary_text: Six queer teenagers struggle to get along with each other and with life in the face of varying obstacles.

name: Berlin Express
summary_text: A multinational group of train passengers become involved in a post-World War II Nazi assassination plot.

name: The Appaloosa
summary_text: Man tries to recover a horse stolen from him by a Mexican bandit.

name: Fun in Acapulco
summary_text: A yacht owner's spoiled daughter gets Mike fired, but a boy helps him get a job as singer at Acapulco Hilton etc. He upsets the lifeguard by taking his girl and 3 daily work hours. Mike's also seeing a woman bullfighter.

summary_text: A quirky love story revolving around the unexpected wedding and unconventional married life of a 26-year-old widow and her late husband's brother, a handsome 30-year-old cardiologist.

summary_text: Young runaway Sherry meets the radical street collective Spark. Together they experience the group's giddy thrills as well as its punishing manipulations, as Sherry's journey to paradise begins to sour.

name: Schneider vs. Bax
summary_text: On his birthday, a hitman reluctantly takes on the easy task of killing a writer, only to find the job a lot more difficult than expected.

summary_text: A girl living with schizophrenia struggles with terrifying hallucinations as she begins to suspect her neighbor has kidnapped a child. The only person who believes her is Caleb -a boy she isn't even sure exists.

summary_text: An ex-US Army commando must find the reason why his comrades from his unit are being systematically murdered before he is next.

name: A Woman's Face
summary_text: A female blackmailer with a disfiguring facial scar meets a plastic surgeon who offers her the possibility of looking like a normal woman.

summary_text: A story set in Indochina in 1959, a land beyond rule and a time without mercy and the birth of a legend.

summary_text: Zaky, a lazy young man decides to work for his father's boss as a bodyguard to protect his stubborn daughter Shereen and her little brother. Soon he becomes a part of the family and a foe for Shereen's jealous boyfriend Hazem.

summary_text: A child cannot stand the idea of having a new brother and dreams about drinking milk from the breasts of his mother again. The child asks the moon to bring him a teet only for him.

name: Mindwalk
summary_text: Philosophical conversations between a poet, politician, and scientist. No one is psychotic or out for revenge.

summary_text: Western frontiers of the USSR, 1942. The region is under German occupation. A man is wrongly accused of collaboration. Desperate to save his dignity, he faces impossible moral choice.

summary_text: A kid dreams of playing professional basketball in order to escape his dead-end job, living in the suburbs, his bossy older brother and running his Mom's ping pong classes.

summary_text: During the Thirty Years' War of 1600s, a band of Protestant mercenaries peacefully coexist with German Catholic villagers in a hidden idyllic mountain valley untouched by war.

name: Real Life
summary_text: A film crew sets out to record a year in the life of an average family, but things quickly start going wrong.

name: See No Evil

summary_text: The ancient Egypt Mummy, Kharis, is transported from his homeland with the high priest Mehemet to wreak vengeance on the family who has defiled the sacred tomb of his beloved Princess Ananka.

name: Ajeeb Daastaans
summary_text: Four shorts explore the surprising ways in which unexpected catalysts inflame the uncomfortable emotions simmering under fractured relationships.

name: Lust in the Dust

summary_text: A college co-ed is brutally raped and struggles alone to rebuild her life.

summary_text: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds a million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.

summary_text: While Ellie is strong, streetwise, practical, social but scholarly weak, Janis is the opposite and thus make ideal room and team mates at a tough 16 week FBI training course.

summary_text: An aspiring filmmaker from Mumbai falls in love with a woman from a strict orthodox Christian family.

name: The Binding
summary_text: While visiting her fiancé's mother in southern Italy, a woman must fight the mysterious and malevolent curse intent on claiming her daughter.

name: The Invisible Circus
summary_text: A teenage girl travels to Paris in the 1970s trying to find out about her sister's suicide, and falls in love with her dead sister's boyfriend.

name: Mother, Jugs & Speed
summary_text: Competition between privately owned Los Angeles, California ambulance companies is played for humor.

name: L'âge des ténèbres
summary_text: Jean-Marc Leblanc (Labrèche), a desperate civil servant, escapes reality as we all know it, to imagine himself as the hero in imaginary adventures.

name: The Sniper
summary_text: A sniper kills young brunettes as the police attempt to grapple with the psychology of the unknown assailant.

name: Ziegfeld Follies
summary_text: The late, great impresario Florenz Ziegfeld Jr. looks down from Heaven and ordains a new revue in his grand old style.

name: Loulou
summary_text: A bored wife leaves her husband for an unemployed, petty criminal.

name: Mother Joan of the Angels
summary_text: A priest is sent to a small parish in the Polish countryside which is believed to be under demonic possession and there he finds his own temptations awaiting.

name: Variety Lights
summary_text: A beautiful and ambitious young woman joins a traveling troupe of third-rate vaudevillians and inadvertently causes jealousy and emotional crises.

name: Commitment
summary_text: The son of a North Korean spy decides to follow in his father's footsteps to protect his little sister.

name: Love Me No More
summary_text: The back story is a marvelous and gorgeous social commentary on the type of generous actions we could all take - to enrich our often-solitary elder-citizens' lives.

name: May Fools
summary_text: During the events of May 1968 in France, different worldviews of conflicting relatives are collide in their family estate.

name: Alyce Kills
summary_text: After accidentally knocking her best friend off a roof, Alyce is haunted by guilt and delves into a brutal nightmare wonderland of sex, drugs and violence, her mind tearing itself apart along with anyone else who gets in her way.

name: Grabben i graven bredvid
summary_text: Modern, urban librarian meets simple, traditional farmer and falls in love.

name: The Final Option

name: Pledge
summary_text: A group of college freshmen pledge an exclusive fraternity but soon realize there's more at stake than they could have ever imagined.

summary_text: Bill Hicks in the height of his genius. Recorded at the Dominion Theatre in London, Hicks opens our eyes and minds to the hypocrisy and ludicrousness of the world around us.

name: Blood from the Mummy's Tomb

name: The Murderer Lives at Number 21

name: Love on the Sidelines
summary_text: Laurel is a struggling fashion designer who finds herself with a job as a personal assistant for Danny, a quarterback sidelined with an injury. Laurel knows nothing about football and Danny hasn't ever had a female assistant.

name: I Dream in Another Language

name: Hoodies vs. Hooligans

summary_text: A downtrodden waiter decides to take up matters with the screenwriter determined to make him suffer.

name: Gettin' Square
summary_text: Barry's released after 8 years prison with good intentions. He looks for work - difficult with a record. Both his kid brother and friend won't stay out of crime.

name: Sheep & Wolves
summary_text: In a magical faraway land, in a picturesque little village nestled among green meadows and rolling hills, lives a flock of carefree sheep. But their pastoral and stress-free life is ...                See full summary »

name: The Forgotten
summary_text: A young psychiatric nurse goes to work at a lonesome asylum following a murder. There, she experiences varying degrees of torment from the patients.

name: Homicidal
summary_text: The brutal stabbing murder of a justice-of-the-peace sparks an investigation of dark family secrets in a sleepy small town in Southern California.

name: Fate of a Man
summary_text: A Soviet soldier, Andrei Sokolov, has been separated with his family by World War II. Suffering in Nazi captivity, he dreams of meeting his darlings after the victory. But cruel fate turned out otherwise.

name: Storm Boy
summary_text: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.

name: Bandits
summary_text: The convicts Emma, Luna, Angel and Marie form a rock band in prison together. A concert for a police ball gives them an opportunity to escape. On the run, they become famous and popular outlaw musicians.

name: Attila Marcel
summary_text: Paul, thirty or so, lives in a Paris apartment with his aunts, two old aristocrats who have raised him since he was two and who dream of seeing him become a virtuoso pianist.

name: The Ugly
summary_text: A female psychologist wants to understand the minds of a confessed serial killer who spent the last five years in a mental hospital because of his state.

name: Kinjite: Forbidden Subjects
summary_text: A brutal Los Angeles police Lt. is determined to bust up an organization that forces underage girls into prostitution.

name: Amy Schumer: Mostly Sex Stuff
summary_text: Nothing is off limits for Amy Schumer in her first original one-hour stand-up special. Schumer airs every hilarious, messed-up detail of her dating and sex life, from encounters with ...                See full summary »

name: Tutta la vita davanti
summary_text: A brilliant recent graduate struggles to find work. After falling into a babysitting job, she is introduced by the child's mother to the world of the international call center, its employees, and the fast pace that drives them.

name: Vital
summary_text: After a tragic car accident where his girlfriend Ryôko Ooyama (Nami Tsukamoto) died, Hiroshi Takagi (Tadanobu Asano) suffers amnesia with his memories completely blanked. When he sees a ...                See full summary »

name: Season of the Witch
summary_text: A neglected, unhappy suburban housewife gets mixed up in witchcraft with unexpected consequences.

name: Island of Terror
summary_text: An isolated remote island community is threatened by an attack by tentacled silicates which liquefy and digest bone and tissue.

name: A Week Away
summary_text: Nowhere left to go, Will Hawkins finds himself at camp for the first time. His instinct is to run, but he finds a friend, a father figure, and even a girl who awakens his heart. Most of all, he finally finds a home.

name: Return to Treasure Island
summary_text: Cartoon adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's most famous adventure novel.

name: Hunger
summary_text: In 1890, Pontus, the starving writer, wanders the streets of Christiania, in search of love and a chance to get his work published. All he meets is defeat and suffering while his sense of ...                See full summary »

name: The Reluctant Dragon
summary_text: Humorist Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to find the great man himself to pitch him the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.

name: Dalida
summary_text: The story of the Egyptian-Italian singer Dalia and her story against life and how she dealt with her problems while she was the most consecrated artist in the history of France.

name: Crawlspace
summary_text: A special forces unit sent, to infiltrate Pine Gap Australia's top secret underground military compound, come under attack from unknown forces.

name: Breaking Surface
summary_text: A winter diving trip in Norway turns into a desperate race against time for two sisters when one of them becomes trapped at the bottom of the ocean by falling rocks.

name: The Rat Pack
summary_text: The public and private lives of Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr. and Peter Lawford.

name: A Cool, Dry Place
summary_text: Russell, single father balances his work as a lawyer with the care of his five-year-old son, after his wife abandoned them. When she reappears creating turmoil, he must deal with his new love interest and a job opportunity of a lifetime.

name: New Jersey Drive
summary_text: Jason and Midget are two young, black teenagers living in Newark,New Jersey, the unofficial car theft capital of the world. Their favourite pastime is that of everybody in their ...                See full summary »

name: Mothers and Daughters
summary_text: Interwoven stories of what it is to be a mom seen through the lens of photographer Rigby Gray.

name: Braid
summary_text: Two wanted women decide to rob their wealthy psychotic friend who lives in the fantasy world they created as children; to take the money they have to take part in a deadly perverse game of make believe.

name: The City of Your Final Destination
summary_text: Twenty-eight-year-old Kansas University doctoral student Omar Razaghi (Omar Metwally) wins a grant to write a biography of Latin American writer Jules Gund. Omar must get through to three ...                See full summary »

name: Barbarians at the Gate
summary_text: The president of a major tobacco company decides to buy the company himself, but a bidding war ensues as other companies make their own offers.

name: Going in Style
summary_text: Three friends living on the dole decide to rob a bank.

name: Black Legion
summary_text: A hard-working machinist loses a promotion to a Polish-born worker, he's seduced into joining the secretive Black Legion, which intimidates foreigners through violence.

name: Eden
summary_text: When a US soccer team gets stranded on a deserted island after a plane crash they must face difficult choices to survive. Modern day Lord of the Flies.

name: Sommaren med Göran
summary_text: A young man is searching for the woman of his dreams. In pursuit of love he sails out to a midsummer party in the seductive Swedish archipelago.

name: Azur et Asmar
summary_text: Raised by the same woman, the dark-complexioned, Asmar, and the flaxen-haired, Azur, set out on a quest to a strange and magical land to liberate the enchanting Djinn-fairy; but, only one can save her. Will the brothers be triumphant?

name: Bloodsport 2
summary_text: A talented street fighter ends up in a torturous prison camp - where he meets Sun, who teaches him humility, self-respect, and the deadliest fighting discipline: The Iron Hand. He promises Sun upon his release, he will fight in The Kumite.

name: Krush Groove
summary_text: The story of a man who has started a new hip-hop/rap label called Krush Groove.

name: Never So Few
summary_text: During WW2, the American OSS mounts covert operations with the native Kachin against the Japanese army in the jungles of Burma.

name: Tolo Tolo
summary_text: Pierfrancesco "Checco" Zalone, a failed entrepreneur, seeks a new life as a waiter on a holiday village in Africa, but the appearance of ISIS forces him to travel again.

name: De noorderlingen
summary_text: During the summer of 1960, the idiosyncratic residents of a one-street Dutch suburb collide in intertwining stories of desire and frustration.

name: Bustin' Loose
summary_text: The director of a foster home is forced to move her kids from Philadelphia to Seattle in a broken-down bus driven by a fast-talking parolee assigned to the task. A hilarious road trip adventure.

name: The Treasure of the Silver Lake
summary_text: In their first cinematic adventure, Apache chief Winnetou and mountain man Old Shatterhand pursue a gang of murderous outlaws who will stop at nothing to find the legendary treasure of Silver Lake.

name: Bells Are Ringing
summary_text: A Brooklyn answering service operator becomes involved in the lives of her clients, including a struggling playwright with whom she begins to fall in love.

name: Lemonade
summary_text: A view of a woman's journey through life.

name: Ali Kundilli
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Swallows and Amazons
summary_text: Four children (the Swallows) on holiday in the Lake District sail on their own to an island and start a war with rival children (the Amazons). In the meantime, a mysterious man on a houseboat accuses them of a crime they did not commit.

name: Carry on at Your Convenience
summary_text: This is the tale of industrial strife at WC Boggs' Lavatory factory. Vic Spanner is the union representative who calls a strike at the drop of a hat; eventually everyone has to get fed up ...                See full summary »

name: Ava's Possessions
summary_text: A young woman recovers from a demonic possession.

name: Yossi
summary_text: This sequel to Yossi and Jagger finds Dr. Yossi Gutmann reminiscing about his love ten years after his death; however, as he encounters a group of young soldiers, one of them, Tom, reignites his romantic feelings.

name: Rover Dangerfield
summary_text: A Vegas show dog gets ditched in the sticks and ends up working on a farm.

name: Five
summary_text: A young man paying the rent for himself and his lifelong friends at an apartment, ends up flat-broke and resorts to selling marijuana to pay the bills - only to get caught up in the dangerous world of drugs.

name: The Monkey King 2
summary_text: When a travelling monk is stranded in a wasteland, The Monkey King must escort him across the land to retrieve sacred scriptures and protect him from an evil demon.

name: Hemlock Society
summary_text: The plot revolves around a man who runs a school called "Hemlock Society" which teaches aspirants how to successfully commit suicide. He develops a bond with one of its students, Meghna (...                See full summary »

name: Breath
summary_text: After developing an interest in surfing, a teenage boy and his friend forge an unlikely friendship with an older surfer.

name: The Legend of Awesomest Maximus
summary_text: A clueless Trojan general must meet an unbeatable Greek warrior on the battlefield.

name: Je vous trouve très beau
summary_text: When farmer Aymé Pigrenet loses his wife, he is not exactly overwhelmed by sorrow, rather by the sheer amount of work that suddenly falls on his shoulders. In quest of a new spouse, he goes to Romania where he meets Elena.

name: Trash Fire
summary_text: When Owen is forced to confront the past he's been running from his whole adult life, he and his girlfriend, Isabel, become entangled in a horrifying web of lies, deceit and murder.

name: Naayak
summary_text: A young man and his lookalike team up to fight injustice and settle their personal scores with the evildoers.

name: Tsar
summary_text: In 16th-century Russia in the grip of chaos, Ivan the Terrible strongly believes he is vested with a holy mission. Believing he can understand and interpret the signs, he sees the Last ...                See full summary »

name: A Matador's Mistress
summary_text: The film starts in the trip from Sevilla to Linares, where Manolete stops in Córdoba to see his mother. He will be remembering some passages of his life.

name: Vykrutasy
summary_text: A school teacher from a small Russian town falls for a beautiful Moscow woman who is engaged to be married.

name: The Boy Who Cried Werewolf
summary_text: A Californian family inherits a castle in Romania. This is especially exciting to the son, who is obsessed with monsters. And he is not disappointed.

name: Killer Condom
summary_text: The plot takes place in New York, and in the present. In a Hotel called "Quicky" a professor blackmails a student of his into having sex with him. But when the professor puts on a condom, ...                See full summary »

name: Irreconcilable Differences
summary_text: Alternating between the past and the present, a precocious little girl sues her selfish, career-driven parents for emancipation, surprising them both.

name: Delgo
summary_text: Delgo, an adventurous but naive teenager, must rally his group of friends to protect their world from conflict between the Lockni and Nohrin people.

name: The Kiss of the Vampire
summary_text: When car trouble strands a honeymooning couple in a small Southern European village, an aristocratic family in the area reaches out to help them with sinister consequences.

name: Straight Story
summary_text: This film is about an upside down world, where being homosexual is considered "normal" and heterosexual is considered "not normal".

name: Jack and Jill vs. the World
summary_text: Jack is a N.Y.C. advertising executive with a life as glossy as the commercials he spins. Jill is new to the city, with nothing to stand on but her fiery personality and romantic ideals. Opposites attract, and together they author their own manifesto of "rules to live by." But Jill betrays Jack by violating rule one - Be Honest.

name: Equinox
summary_text: Four friends are attacked by a demon while on a picnic, due to possession of a tome of mystic information. Told in flashbacks by the sole survivor.

name: Joe
summary_text: Two men, Bill, a wealthy conservative, and Joe, a far-right factory worker, form a dangerous bond after Bill confesses to Joe about murdering his daughter's drug dealer boyfriend.

name: Our Relations
summary_text: Two pairs of long-lost twin brothers experience high jinks involving a valuable ring, cases of mistaken identity, and gangsters.

name: A Bag of Hammers
summary_text: Ben and Alan, two misfit best friends incapable of growing up, find direction for their lives by taking in an abandoned child and creating the family they've always needed.

name: The Butterfly
summary_text: This is the story of a young girl named Elsa who was raised by a single mother (Isabelle) in the city. Isabelle and Elsa begin the film moving in next door to an elderly man who collects ...                See full summary »

name: The Coca-Cola Kid
summary_text: Ex-marine turned Coca-Cola marketing guru Becker is on a mission to boost sales in Australia when he discovers a dry spot in the Outback, where everyone is guzzling homegrown brew - and not a drop of his company's cola.

name: Of Unknown Origin
summary_text: A man becomes destructively obsessed with killing a dangerous rat, which has taken residence in his, recently renovated, house.

name: Compulsion
summary_text: The lives of two female neighbors intersect when their individual obsessions begin to unravel.

name: Nosso Lar
summary_text: The life of the doctor André Luiz in the spiritual city of Nosso Lar.

name: Teenage Dirtbag
summary_text: A popular high school girl is harassed by a delinquent boy until they are placed in creative writing class together. Through written words, they create a bond, but tragically a bond that ...                See full summary »

name: Ukikusa monogatari
summary_text: A kabuki actor's mistress hatches a jealous plot to bring down her lover's son.

name: Them That Follow
summary_text: Set deep in the wilds of Appalachia, where believers handle death-dealing snakes to prove themselves before God, a pastor's daughter holds a secret that threatens to tear her community apart.

name: Morfiy
summary_text: A drama that chronicles the civil war that raged after the 1917 Bolshevik revolution.
